title: 4v6 3v7? 2v8?
body:
Is it just me or the amount of games where 1-3 people are getting caught out over and over has skyrocketed? I get told these are games you can't really win/shouldn't care about but it's become like 60-70% of games in recent weeks, some of which were won by the opponents making the same easily avoidable mistakes or because at 45 minutes we get a lucky won fight.

How do you actually combat this instead of trying not to care since the frequency is so large?

replies.body: Ping people BEFORE they get caught or do obviously dumb stuff. Doesn't work every time, but if you can stop people throwing a few games here and there, it adds up pretty fast.

I've been noticing this too actually, not so much about the winning lucky fights, but just lots of mistakes. I'm making some of these mistakes too of course, but holy shit some people get careless. Especially after 40 minutes, they bring on this super throwing mentality.

Anyway, I think it's due to all the players who haven't played in months coming back from holidays, school or work all logging in and being a little rusty.
